demographics.occupation: Successful Entrepreneur, High-Level Executive, or Spouse of a High-Net-Worth Individual
demographics.location: Mexico City (Polanco, Lomas de Chapultepec), Monterrey (San Pedro Garza García), Guadalajara

psychographics.goals: Invest in her health and well-being as a status symbol, seek out the best products and experiences, maintain a sophisticated and aspirational lifestyle.
psychographics.challenges: Finding brands that meet her high standards of quality, purity, and design; cutting through the noise of mass-market wellness trends.
psychographics.values: Quality, craftsmanship, brand heritage, exclusivity, authenticity, and beautiful design.

mediaConsumption.socialMedia: Instagram, LinkedIn, and private social clubs.
mediaConsumption.publications: Vogue México, Robb Report, Forbes México, and high-end travel and lifestyle magazines.
mediaConsumption.influencers: Follows a curated list of 'taste-makers' in Mexico: socialites, top architects, renowned chefs, and successful entrepreneurs who embody a sophisticated lifestyle.

audiencePersonas.needs: A wellness product that is not only effective but also beautifully designed and packaged; a brand that aligns with her values and reflects her status.
